salmonrun1.title: Salmon Run
salmonrun1.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 200 and set the map to Gone Fission Hydroplant. Make sure all players select "?" as their weapon (This is the default option).

Players will work together to clear the shift. Everyone wins if you clear all 3 waves.

When submitting results, enter Win if you cleared all 3 waves or Lose if you failed to clear all 3 waves.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

salmonrun2.title: Salmon Run
salmonrun2.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 200 and set the map to Bonerattle Arena. Make sure all players select "?" as their weapon (This is the default option).

Players will work together to clear the shift. Everyone wins if you clear all 3 waves.

When submitting results, enter Win if you cleared all 3 waves or Lose if you failed to clear all 3 waves.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

salmonrun3.title: Salmon Run
salmonrun3.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 200 and set the map to Jammin' Salmon Junction. Make sure all players select "?" as their weapon (This is the default option).

Players will work together to clear the shift. Everyone wins if you clear all 3 waves.

When submitting results, enter Win if you cleared all 3 waves or Lose if you failed to clear all 3 waves.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

understaffed.title: Under Staffed
understaffed.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 150 and set the map to Sockeye Station. Players may select any weapon they'd like for this minigame.

Uh-Oh! Your coworkers didn't show up to work today. Mr. Grizz isn't going to take that as an excuse to not make your quota though. 2 players will work together to clear the shift. Both players win if you clear all 3 waves.

When submitting results, enter Win if you cleared all 3 waves or Lose if you failed to clear all 3 waves.

Rewards:
Win: 20 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

salmonrun1v3.title: 3 Fishers and a Shark
salmonrun1v3.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 150 and the map to Spawning Grounds.

{Player} is a "Thrower." The other 3 players will attempt to clear the shift to win. If the shift is failed, the thrower will win. Use any (in game) means nessisary to secure victory!

When submitting results, if you cleared the shift, enter Win for the 3 regular players and Lose for the thrower. If you did not clear the shift, enter Lose for the regular players and Win for the thrower.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

salmonrunreverse1v3.title: Kindergarten Bullying
salmonrunreverse1v3.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 50 and the map to Salmonid Smokeyard.

{Player} is trying to clear the shift. The other 3 players are "Throwers" attempting to lose the shift. If the shift is failed, the throwers will win. Use any (in game) means nessisary to secure victory!

When submitting results, if you cleared the shift, enter Win for the regular player and Lose for the throwers. If you did not clear the shift, enter Lose for the regular player and Win for the throwers.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

tableturf.title: Tableturf Battle
tableturf.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Tableturf Battle Lobby. Set the map to Thunder Point and set the turn timer to 60 seconds.

Players will compete in a regular tableturf match. Whoever has the most tiles set to their color at the end of the game wins.

When submitting results, enter Win for the winner of the match and Lose for the loser.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

goldeneggs.title: Over Fishing
goldeneggs.description:
This minigame is played in a Private Salmon Run Lobby. Set the Hazard Level to 100 and the map to Bonerattle Arena

Players will compete over the course of a salmon run shift to collect the most Golden Eggs. Players will recieve 1 coin for every 3 Golden Eggs collected.

When submitting results, enter the Golden Egg totals on the Recent Jobs tab in game.

Rewards:
1 Coin per 3 Golden Eggs

gamble.title: Gambling
gamble.description:
This minigame is played individually in the Lobby at the Shellout Machine.

Players will do a single pull from the Shellout Machine. Whoever get the rarest pull will get 1st place, followed by the 2nd rarest and so on. If 2 players get the same pull it is considered a tie.

Rarities are as follows from rarest to most common: Gold, Silver, Bronze, Emote, Party Food Ticket, Pack of Cards, Banner, 2x Food Tickets, 3 Ability Chunks, Title, Stickers, Decorations, 50% Food Ticket, Drink Ticket

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the rarest pull, 2 for the 2nd rarest and so on.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 3 Coins
3rd: 2 Coins
4th: 0 Coins

speedrun1.title: Speedrun Race (5-6)
speedrun1.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 5-6: Zipping over the Neighborhood.

Players will play through level 5-6 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 3 Coins
3rd: 2 Coins
4th: 0 Coins

speedrun2.title: Speedrun Race (4-3)
speedrun2.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 4-3: Let's Put a Pin in That.

Players will play through level 4-3 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 3 Coins
3rd: 2 Coins
4th: 0 Coins

speedrun3.title: Speedrun Race (6-6)
speedrun3.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 6-6: Keep It Rolling.

Players will play through level 6-6 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 3 Coins
3rd: 2 Coins
4th: 0 Coins

anarchyopen.title: Anarchy
anarchyopen.description:
This minigame is played together in Anarchy Open.

Players will play one match of Anarchy Open together. Your goal is to win. Simple enough.

When submitting results, enter Win if you won the match or Lose if you lost.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

scrim1.title: Splat Zones
scrim1.description:
This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Splat Zones. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be seperated randomly into 2 teams. Your goal is to win the match with your team. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted.

When submitting results, enter Win if the player was on the winning team or enter Lose if they were not.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

scrim2.title: Tower Control
scrim2.description:
This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Tower Control. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be seperated randomly into 2 teams. Your goal is to win the match with your team. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted.

When submitting results, enter Win if the player was on the winning team or enter Lose if they were not.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

scrim3.title: Clam Blitz
scrim3.description:
This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Clam Blitz. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be seperated randomly into 2 teams. Your goal is to win the match with your team. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted.

When submitting results, enter Win if the player was on the winning team or enter Lose if they were not.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

rainmaker1.title: Astro's Modded Rainmaker #1
rainmaker1.description:
My team has been hard at work figuring out how we can make Splatoon 3 for the Nintendo Switch better! And what we found was YOU ALL HATE RAINMAKER. So I fixed the mode! Your Welcome!

This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Rainmaker. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

{Player} and {Player} are "Throwers" attempting to make their team lose. Put both of them on different teams. The rest of the players will be seperated randomly into 2 the teams. The rest of the players' goal is to win the match. Throwers can use any (in game) means nessisary to make their team lose the game. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted.

When submitting results, enter Win if a regular player was on the winning team or if a thrower was on the losing team. Enter Lose if a regular player was on the losing team or if a thrower was on the winning team.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

rainmaker2.title: Astro's Modded Rainmaker #2
rainmaker2.description:
My team has been hard at work figuring out how we can make Splatoon 3 for the Nintendo Switch better! And what we found was YOU ALL HATE RAINMAKER. So I fixed the mode again! Your Welcome!

This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Rainmaker. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be randomly seperated into 2 teams. Your goal is to win the game of rainmaker but death is PERMANENT. Once your inkling or octoling dies once in game, you may not leave your spawner. If you accidentally leave your spawner, jump off the map to put yourself back. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted. Any rule breaks will result in the offending team automatically losing.

When submitting results, enter Win if the player was on the winning team or enter Lose if they were not.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

rainmaker3.title: Astro's Modded Rainmaker #3
rainmaker3.description:
My team has been hard at work figuring out how we can make Splatoon 3 for the Nintendo Switch better! And what we found was YOU ALL HATE RAINMAKER. So I fixed the mode for a third time! Be Grateful!

This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Rainmaker. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be randomly seperated into 2 teams. Your goal is to win the game of rainmaker but your team can only pick-up the rainmaker ONCE. Obtaining any checkpoint allows your team a second pick-up of the rainmaker. If a player accidentally picks up the rainmaker when their team is not allowed to, they must not input anything on their controller until they lose possession of the rainmaker. Use of voice calls for callouts is permitted. Any rule breaks will result in the offending team automatically losing.

When submitting results, enter Win if the player was on the winning team or enter Lose if they were not.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

kills.title: "Killer" Payout
kills.description:
This minigame is played together in a Private Battle lobby with the mode set to Turf War. The host can pick their favorite map to play on.

Players will be seperated randomly into 2 teams. Your goal is get as many Kills/Assists as possible. You will recieve 1 Coin for every Kill/Assist. Weapon kits with Angle Shooter or Point Sensor are not allowed to be used.

When submitting results, enter the Kills/Assists value for each player on the latest Battle Log.

Rewards:
1 Coin per Kill/Assist

killtarget.title: A Dangerous Game of Chicken
killtarget.description:
This minigame is played together in Turf War.

Players will compete to see who can get the closest to 15 Kills/Assists without going over. If a player has more than 15 kills/assists in the battle log, they are awarded last place.

When submitting results, give 1st to the player closest to 15 kills/assists without going over. Give 2nd to the player second closest to 15 and so on.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 3 Coins
3rd: 2 Coins
4th: 0 Coins

speedrun1extra.title: Speedrun Race (3-1)
speedrun1extra.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 3-1: Climbing the Cooperate Splatter.

Players will play through level 3-1 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 7 Coins
3rd: 5 Coins
4th: 4 Coins
5th: 3 Coins
6th: 2 Coins
7th: 1 Coin
8th: 0 Coins

speedrun2extra.title: Speedrun Race (5-11)
speedrun2extra.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 5-11: Simply Zipcastic.

Players will play through level 5-11 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 7 Coins
3rd: 5 Coins
4th: 4 Coins
5th: 3 Coins
6th: 2 Coins
7th: 1 Coin
8th: 0 Coins

speedrun3extra.title: Speedrun Race (5-3)
speedrun3extra.description:
This minigame is played individually in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 5-3: Uh-Oh! Too Many Snipers!

Players will play through level 5-3 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level the fastest to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. A penalty of 5 seconds will be added for each time you die in game.

When submitting results, enter 1 for the player with the fastest time, 2 for the 2nd fastest and so on. If 2 players have the same time, it is considered a tie. If a player does not remember their time, they are given last place.

Rewards:
1st: 10 Coins
2nd: 7 Coins
3rd: 5 Coins
4th: 4 Coins
5th: 3 Coins
6th: 2 Coins
7th: 1 Coin
8th: 0 Coins

goldeneggssolo.title: Over Fishing Solo
goldeneggssolo.description:
This minigame is played solo in a Freelance Salmon Run Lobby.

You will compete over the course of a salmon run shift to collect as many Golden Eggs as possible. You will recieve 1 coin for every 3 Golden Eggs you collect.

When submitting results, enter the number of Golden Egg you collected on the Recent Jobs tab in game. Not the total golden eggs collected by everyone.

Rewards:
1 Coin per 3 Golden Eggs

killssolo.title: "Killer" Payout Solo
killssolo.description:
This minigame is played solo in Turf War.

Your goal is get as many Kills/Assists as possible. You will recieve 1 Coin for every 4 Kill/Assist you get. Weapon kits with Angle Shooter or Point Sensor are not allowed to be used.

When submitting results, enter the Kills/Assists for your player on the latest Battle Log.

Rewards:
1 Coin per Kill/Assist

speedrunsolo.title: Speedrun Race Solo (3-6)
speedrunsolo.description:
This minigame is played solo in Alterna (aka Story Mode) on level 3-6: Time Trial and Errors.

You will play through level 3-6 once as quickly as possible. Play through the level faster than AstroDwarf's prerecorded time to win! Your final time will be the time that shows up on the level clear screen. Astro did it in 51 seconds. If you die or the in game timer runs out while playing the level, you will automatically lose the race.

When submitting results, enter Win if you were faster or tied Astro's time of 0:51 otherwise enter Lose.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins

anarchysolo.title: Anarchy Solo
anarchysolo.description:
This minigame is played solo in Anarchy Open.

You will play one match of Anarchy Open. Your goal is to win. Simple enough.

When submitting results, enter Win if you won the match or Lose if you lost.

Rewards:
Win: 10 Coins
Lose: 0 Coins
